statements: SELECT * FROM BankAccount ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM BankAccount WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_type FROM BankAccount WHERE account_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM BankAccount WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT account_number FROM BankAccount ORDER BY account_id ASC, balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM BankAccount WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC
SELECT account_id, account_number FROM BankAccount WHERE account_type='Savings' AND balance < 5000
SELECT account_id, account_number, balance FROM BankAccount WHERE account_number LIKE 'ABC%' AND account_type='Checking'
SELECT * FROM BankAccount WHERE account_type IN ('Savings', 'Checking') ORDER BY balance ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BankAccount WHERE balance < 0
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_holder, balance FROM bank_accounts ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT account_holder, account_number FROM bank_accounts WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_holder LIKE 'J%';
SELECT card_holder, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_holder DESC
SELECT account_holder, balance FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_holder LIKE 'A%'
SELECT account_id, balance, account_holder FROM bank_accounts WHERE balance < 5000 AND account_holder NOT LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY balance ASC
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_id IN (2, 5, 7)
SELECT account_holder, account_number, balance FROM bank_accounts WHERE balance BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts;
SELECT account_holder, account_balance FROM bank_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE card_type = 'Visa';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_holder, account_balance, account_type FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_holder DESC;
SELECT account_holder, SUM(account_balance) AS total_balance FROM bank_accounts GROUP BY account_holder HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder, card_type, card_limit FROM bank_accounts JOIN credit_cards ON bank_accounts.account_id = credit_cards.card_id;
SELECT account_holder, transaction_type, amount FROM bank_accounts JOIN transactions ON bank_accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts;
SELECT account_holder, balance, account_number FROM bank_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM bank_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.holder_name FROM transactions t JOIN account_holders a ON t.account_number = a.holder_id;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_holder, balance FROM bank_accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM account_holders WHERE holder_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT card_holder, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit < 5000;
SELECT account_holder, balance, transaction_date FROM bank_accounts JOIN transactions ON bank_accounts.account_number = transactions.account_number;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts;
SELECT account_number, account_type FROM bank_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM credit_cards WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT account_number, account_type FROM bank_accounts WHERE account_type = 'savings';
SELECT card_number, card_holder_name FROM credit_cards WHERE card_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT holder_name, email_address, address FROM account_holders WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY holder_name ASC;
